alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 5:39PM EST until February 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Northern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest freezing rain will occur through 9 PM this evening. Temperatures are expected to quickly climb above freezing by midnight tonight, ending the threat for ice accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
